summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1369, for the improvement of North 55th Street, from East Green Lake Boulevard to Keystone Place; Ladd Street, from Keystone Place to Kensington Place; North and East 56th Street, from Kensington Place to Latona Avenue; and Meridian Avenue from North 50th Street to North 55th Street, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 15077 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
